title: Looking to buy Doolan batting for back run!
author: Mookieroro511

posts.post_title: Looking to buy Doolan batting for back run!
posts.post_content:
I’m looking to buy Doolan Batting for a back run I’m working on

I need all except the following:

American Beauty 350
EPDG
Polar Bear
Tolstoi
Sweet Caporal 350/30

Looking for lower grade, preferably graded but raw is welcome. Not looking to spend a ton of money on this project so nothing high grade. Thanks everyone!
